content.question: Which of the following can replace /* missing code */ so that the code segment will work as intended?

choices.label: int x = 10; for (int value : numbers) { value = x; x += 10; }
for (int j = 0; j < numbers.length; j++) { numbers[j] = j * 10; }
numbers[0] = 10; for (int j = 0; j <numbers.length; j++) { numbers[j] = numbers[j] + 10; }
numbers[3] = 40; for (int j = numbers.length - 1; j > 0; j--) { numbers[j - 1] = numbers[j] – 10; }

content.answer: numbers[3] = 40; for (int j = numbers.length - 1; j > 0; j--) { numbers[j - 1] = numbers[j] – 10; }

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
